Package com.hac.IO

Class IOManager

java.lang.Object
com.hac.IO.IOManager
public class IOManager extends Object
The IOManager class is a singleton utility class responsible for handling file I/O operations such as reading, writing, and appending to files, as well as streaming content from an HttpURLConnection to a file.

    • getInstance

      public static IOManager getInstance()
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the IOManager class.

    • readFromFile

      public String readFromFile(String fileName) throws IOException
      Reads the content of a file and returns it as a string.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to be read.
      Returns:
      The content of the file as a string.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • writeToFile

      public void writeToFile(String fileName, String data) throws IOException
      Writes the specified data string to a file with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to be written to.
      data - The data string to be written to the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while writing to the file.

    • appendToFile

      public void appendToFile(String fileName, String data) throws IOException
      Appends the specified data string to a file with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to be appended to.
      data - The data string to be appended to the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while appending to the file.

    • streamToFile

      public void streamToFile(HttpURLConnection connection, String outputFileName) throws IOException
      Streams the content of an HttpURLConnection to a file with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      connection - The HttpURLConnection to stream the content from.
      outputFileName - The name of the file to stream the content to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while streaming the content.
